well, i'm sorry but, most of the new testament is misdirection.  Paul clearly set himself against god.  Paul is an "anti-maseyah", or for churchers, an anti-christ.  If you don't see it you should really look again.  just read the material in the link above or go to http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvHaGzDnp6MuqPKDxF26YYeNv7kHb34kv/ or http://blessyahowah.com.

@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: i see the problem.  I've fixed the main landing page, but i'll have to fix the others this evening.  thanks for catching it.

@Freeperson: it may be that you should not care what anyone that you have not heard of has to say.  BTW, BlessYahowah is a phrase that is used as the name of a site.  Yahowah is the name of the God of Israel.  All I can tell you is to check it out if you wish and decide for yourself.  I am not a xtian, nor am I part of any other religion.  I don't want anything from anyone.  I only try to seek after the truth as much as possible.  If anyone doesn't agree, that's fine by me.  Thanks you for your input though.  I'm glad to see all the input.  All I ask is, just check stuff out before you dismiss it.

@Krixano: Well, from my studies, YaH-oW-aH is the most accurate, but I would say Yahweh is acceptable i assume.  He is also called Yah, for short.  As in HalleluYah.  As for Paul, he is not a "Jew" , he is a Benjamite by his own description.  Yahowah says that Benjamin is a ravening wolf.  And who did Yahowsha (erroneously known to many as jesus) warn to be wary of?... the ravening wolves.  Paul's name was originally Saul.  In Hebrew it's pronounced Sha-ool.  Habakkuk 2 is specifically about Shaul and mentions him by name, about how he will lead many away to their destruction.  Shaul/Paul is the sole creator of "christianity", or a modern form of babylonian sungod worship.  I know it's hard to take in.  It was for me for many years.  Now I know and have been set free.
These things go against the mainstream thought process, but it's truth usually outside of the main stream?  If you keep searching you will see.  Don't follow me, follow the words of Yah.
btw, the Hebrew roots movement is just christianity trying to hide.  Yah's children can't be double minded...
I am encourage to see your interest in the matter.

@Krixano: i am very well aquainted with the hebrew roots movement.  I used to identify as part of that group.  What you must realize is that that all of the 'bible' does not represent Yahowah.  The hebrew roots group try to follow certain precepts in the 'old testamant' as it is called, while still clinging to writings in the 'new testament' that are not Yah's words.  First, we must know how to tell what is Yah's words and what is not.  This answer can only be found in the 'old' part.  Every religion (which are all manmade) cling to different 'cherry picked' verses and scriptures to give themselves clout or justification.  This doesn't mean they are of god.  Trying to mix manmade religions with Yah's teachings is being "double minded".
Find the answer to this question:  Who annointed or told paul that he was an apostle?  Paul never met Yahowsha,....ever.  Yahowsha specifically gave a warning that if anyone says they saw me here or there, that room or in the wilderness do not believe them... next thing you know...Paul is seeing him in the wilderness.  Paul specifically said that he had was being controlled by a demon.  Do we need more specifics.  God said if a man is not circumcised in his FLESH and his spirit he cannot enter his place of rest.  Paul said, if a person is circumcised then he is doomed.  who do we believe??  We could get very technical and detailed if you want, but if you keep reading and studying, you will find these answers.  This site that i have seeded is not "the scripture" .  It is an accurate, unbiased translation of the oldest know hebrew texts with study notes.  Nothing is hidden.  No money is required.  No group to join....except Yah's family.  There is only one family and there is only one Hebrew name that describes it.  See if you can find it?
A desctiption of paul/shaul and fortold by Yah > http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvHaGzDnp6MuqPKDxF26YYeNv7kHb34kv/a/chabakuk2.html

@Krixano: Maybe trying to hide is not the correct phrasing, b/c they are not really trying to hide, but they only go part way.  Hopefully they will keep exploring and study.  I hope you do as well.  You seem fairly dedicated, which is good.  I am 45 years old.  I have been studying scripture and hebrew most of my adult life.  This is not new to me.  I have grown weary of arguing with people over the years.  I will help anyone, but i'm really not into arguing anymore.  All I can tell you is that christianity is a lie that uses the truth as a cloak, and paul was the taylor.  This information can be found in the bible for anyone who want to know.  The only way to get to where God is, is to follow his instructions ONLY and noone else.  "Hear O Israel Yahowah is Almighty, Yahowah is ONE.  Thanks for the chat, but, i'm old and tired from working all day in the heat... and teaching myselft python, so I'll say good night.  Good night.
